channel.title: online marketplace on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in online marketplace on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
VRBO Logo
Vrbo is an American vacation rental online marketplace originally known as Vacation Rentals by Owner or VRBO. It was acquired by HomeAway in 2006. Expedia Group acquired HomeAway on December 15, 2015. On March 27, 2019, VRBO was re-branded Vrbo, including a new logo, capitalization, and pronunciation. In July 2020, HomeAway and Vrbo websites became a single Vrbo website. Vrbo started with an annual homeowner subscription model where an annual fee allowed homeowners to list their condo, beach house, or cabin on the website.
You can download theVRBOlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: VRBO
item.description: Vrbo is an American vacation rental online marketplace originally known as Vacation Rentals by Owner or VRBO. It was acquired by HomeAway in 2006. Expedia Group acquired HomeAway on December 15, 2015. On March 27, 2019, VRBO was re-branded Vrbo, including a new logo, capitalization, and pronunciation. In July 2020, HomeAway and Vrbo websites became a single Vrbo website. Vrbo started with an annual homeowner subscription model where an annual fee allowed homeowners to list their condo, beach house, or cabin on the website.
